item.title: Implementing the Dhikr Resource
item.description: We added the Dhikr resource to the Sufii API: setting up a schema in MongoDB, handling audio uploads with worker threads, processing video and links into audio, and integrating Cloudflare R2 storage.

item.title: Initiating the Sufii API Project
item.description: Kicking off the Sufii API project: setting up Node.js + Express with MongoDB, adding middleware for file uploads to Cloudflare R2, and implementing the first artists endpoint.

item.title: Deploying My Portfolio with Cloudflare Pages
item.description: How I deployed my Hugo + Congo portfolio using Cloudflare Pages.

item.title: Launching My First Portfolio
item.description: How I built my first portfolio using Hugo and the Congo theme.
